verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> of David מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm קַוֹּ֣ה <WH6960> I waited קִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6960> patiently יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> for the LORD וַיֵּ֥ט <WH5186> and he inclined אֵ֝לַ֗י <WH413> to me וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> unto me and heard שַׁוְעָתִֽי׃ <WH7775> my cry

וַיַּעֲלֵ֤נִי ׀ <WH5927> He brought me up מִבּ֥וֹר <WH953> pit שָׁאוֹן֮ <WH7588> also out of an horrible מִטִּ֪יט <WH2916> clay הַיָּ֫וֵ֥ן <WH3121> out of the miry וַיָּ֖קֶם <WH6965> and set עַל־ <WH5921> upon סֶ֥לַע <WH5553> upon a rock רַגְלַ֗י <WH7272> my feet כּוֹנֵ֥ן <WH3559> [and] established אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃ <WH838> my goings

וַיִּתֵּ֬ן <WH5414> And he hath put בְּפִ֨י ׀ <WH6310> in my mouth שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> song חָדָשׁ֮ <WH2319> a new תְּהִלָּ֪ה <WH8416> [even] praise לֵֽאלֹ֫הֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> unto our God יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> many וְיִירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> [it] and fear וְ֝יִבְטְח֗וּ <WH982> and shall trust בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed הַגֶּ֗בֶר <WH1397> [is] that man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> that maketh יְ֭הֹוָה <WH3068> the LORD מִבְטַח֑וֹ <WH4009> his trust וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not פָנָ֥ה <WH6437> and respecteth אֶל־ <WH413> to רְ֝הָבִ֗ים <WH7295> not the proud וְשָׂטֵ֥י <WH7750> nor such as turn aside כָזָֽב׃ <WH3577> to lies

רַבּ֤וֹת <WH7227> Many עָשִׂ֨יתָ ׀ <WH6213> works [which] thou hast done אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> O יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהַי֮ <WH430> my God נִֽפְלְאֹתֶ֥יךָ <WH6381> [are] thy wonderful וּמַחְשְׁבֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH4284> and thy thoughts אֵ֫לֵ֥ינוּ <WH413> toward אֵ֤ין ׀ <WH369> There עֲרֹ֬ךְ <WH6186> [which are] to us-ward they cannot be reckoned up in order אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> toward אַגִּ֥ידָה <WH5046> unto thee [if] I would declare וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <WH1696> and speak עָ֝צְמ֗וּ <WH6105> [of them] they are more מִסַּפֵּֽר׃ <WH5608> than can be numbered

זֶ֤בַח <WH2077> Sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֨ה ׀ <WH4503> and offering לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not חָפַ֗צְתָּ <WH2654> thou didst not desire אָ֭זְנַיִם <WH241> mine ears כָּרִ֣יתָ <WH3738> hast thou opened לִּ֑י עוֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> burnt offering וַ֝חֲטָאָ֗ה <WH2401> and sin offering לֹ֣א <WH3808> have not שָׁאָֽלְתָּ׃ <WH7592> hast thou not required

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> Then said הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold בָ֑אתִי <WH935> I Lo I come בִּמְגִלַּת־ <WH4039> in the volume סֵ֝֗פֶר <WH5612> of the book כָּת֥וּב <WH3789> [it is] written עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> unto

לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת־ <WH6213> to do רְצוֹנְךָ֣ <WH7522> thy will אֱלֹהַ֣י <WH430> O my God חָפָ֑צְתִּי <WH2654> I delight וְ֝ת֥וֹרָתְךָ֗ <WH8451> yea thy law בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> [is] within מֵעָֽי׃ <WH4578> my heart

בִּשַּׂ֤רְתִּי <WH1319> I have preached צֶ֨דֶק ׀ <WH6664> righteousness בְּקָ֘הָ֤ל <WH6951> congregation רָ֗ב <WH7227> in the great הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold שְׂ֭פָתַי <WH8193> my lips לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶכְלָ֑א <WH3607> lo I have not refrained יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> thou knowest

צִדְקָתְךָ֬ <WH6666> thy righteousness לֹא־ <WH3808> have not כִסִּ֨יתִי ׀ <WH3680> I have not hid בְּת֬וֹךְ <WH8432> within לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> my heart אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <WH530> thy faithfulness וּתְשׁוּעָתְךָ֣ <WH8668> and thy salvation אָמָ֑רְתִּי <WH559> I have declared לֹא־ <WH3808> have not כִחַ֥דְתִּי <WH3582> I have not concealed חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> thy lovingkindness וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <WH571> and thy truth לְקָהָ֥ל <WH6951> congregation רָֽב׃ <WH7227> from the great

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> from me O LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> will not תִכְלָ֣א <WH3607> Withhold רַחֲמֶ֣יךָ <WH7356> not thou thy tender mercies מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> let thy lovingkindness וַ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <WH571> and thy truth תָּמִ֥יד <WH8548> continually יִצְּרֽוּנִי׃ <WH5341> preserve

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אָפְפ֥וּ־ <WH661> have compassed עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> and רָע֡וֹת <WH7451> evils עַד־ <WH5704> against אֵ֬ין <WH369> else מִסְפָּ֗ר <WH4557> For innumerable הִשִּׂיג֣וּנִי <WH5381> have taken hold עֲ֭וֹנֹתַי <WH5771> me about mine iniquities וְלֹא־ <WH3808> I am not יָכֹ֣לְתִּי <WH3201> upon me so that I am not able לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> to look up עָצְמ֥וּ <WH6105> they are more מִשַּֽׂעֲר֥וֹת <WH8185> than the hairs רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <WH7218> of mine head וְלִבִּ֥י <WH3820> therefore my heart עֲזָבָֽנִי׃ <WH5800> faileth
רְצֵ֣ה <WH7521> Be pleased יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <WH5833> to help חֽוּשָׁה׃ <WH2363> make haste

יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ ׀ <WH2659> and confounded יַחַד֮ <WH3162> together מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י <WH1245> that seek נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> after my soul לִסְפּ֫וֹתָ֥הּ <WH5595> to destroy יִסֹּ֣גוּ <WH5472> it let them be driven אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <WH3637> and put to shame חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <WH2655> that wish רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> me evil

יָ֭שֹׁמּוּ <WH8074> Let them be desolate עַל־ <WH5921> for עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH1322> of their shame הָאֹמְרִ֥ים <WH559> that say לִ֝֗י הֶאָ֥ח ׀ <WH1889> unto me Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <WH1889> aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <WH7797> thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ ׀ <WH8055> and be glad בְּךָ֗ כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <WH1245> Let all those that seek יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> say תָ֭מִיד <WH8548> continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> be magnified יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD אֹֽ֝הֲבֵ֗י <WH157> in thee let such as love תְּשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH8668> thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I am עָנִ֣י <WH6041> But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <WH34> and needy אֲדֹנָ֪י <WH136> [yet] the Lord יַחֲשָׁ֫ב <WH2803> thinketh לִ֥י עֶזְרָתִ֣י <WH5833> upon me thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <WH6403> and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <WH859> O אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> O my God אַל־ <WH408> not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <WH309> make no tarrying
